messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats: Run many of our biggest cities including Liverpool, Sheffield and Bristol. Won more votes than Labour in the last elections. Are stronger now than at any time since 1929. Can deliver real change across Britain today.

messages.title: Merlene Emerson delivers for us
messages.content: Merlene is a former corporate lawyer turned community mediator, and is currently a director of a registered social landlord.

messages.title: Action on Jobs
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will introduce a Green Jobs and Growth Strategy to help the UK lead on low-carbon technologies and services.

messages.title: On the Environment
messages.content: In Hammersmith we need to take action to clean up the Thames, monitor the quality of the air we breathe, stop Heathrow expansion and support our Recycling for a more sustainable future.

messages.title: Listens to your concerns
messages.content: Whether it is a new planning or transport development, cuts to local services or crime, Merlene and the Liberal Democrats believe that every citizen deserves quality consultation and a real opportunity to influence local decision making.

messages.title: My contract with Hammersmith people
messages.content: I will put local people first. I will be there to help, listen to your concerns and stand up for our community. I will make sure your voice is heard locally and at Westminster. I will be a strong voice for you.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Four steps to a fairer Britain
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. A fair chance for every child. Fairer future: create jobs by making Britain greener. A fair deal for you from the politicians.

issues.environment: In Hammersmith we need to take action to clean up the Thames, monitor the quality of the air we breathe, stop Heathrow expansion and support our Recycling for a more sustainable future.

politicalExperience.role: Former corporate lawyer, community mediator, director of a registered social landlord
